name: NEW PREMIUM SEATS! WestJet Boeing 737 MAX 8 Vancouver to Calgary
description:
WestJet's Premium product has undergone some big changes in the past few years, most notably with the addition of proper 2x2 recliner style seats in place of the older "Euro-business" Economy ones with the middle seat blocker.

The 737 MAXs all have these new 2x2 seats, and after having flown the first commercial 737 MAX flight in Canada in 22 months, I tried out Premium on the very second flight, back to Calgary!

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

FLIGHT INFORMATION
Airline: WestJet Airlines (WJA/WS)
Aircraft: Boeing 737 MAX 8 (B38M)
Flight Number: WS122
Seat: 1F
Livery: New (2018)
Engines: 2x CFM LEAP-1B
Registration: C-FHCM
Route: Vancouver (YVR) - Calgary (YYC)
Callsign: WESTJET 122
Runway used: 26L (YVR) - 35L (YYC)
Date filmed: January 2021
